text.tspan: if you do not appear to
re-write the test at the above date, time, and place,
you must contact IRCC within thirty
(30) days of the date of your appointment and provide a reasonable explanation for not
attending. You may contact the IRCC Call Centre at 1-888-242-2100, send a letter to the
IRCC mailing address found on this notice or e-mail at Generic Email Account@cic.gc.ca. If
you do not contact IRCC or if your explanation is not acceptable, your application will be
treated as abandoned and your file will be closed. Once the case has been closed, and if
you are still interested in becoming a Canadian citizen, you will need to submit a new
application with new documents and fees.
